divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving thurough going west on a delevery i had had a good sleep in and agood meal so i was ready to drive on in to lasvegas i was thinking to my selfthat i might get a snak at kingmen or at flaggstaff when to the horth at about 2oclock on the clock this thing came over the hills it was moveing very slowil atfirst i thought that it might be some sort of new plane that the goverment wastesting but it was moving to slow for that i was moving west at about 70 mi perhr and it crossed the road just about the time i got to the power station thatis out there by 40 the night was very bright there was a full moon that nightthe date given is as far back as i can remember it is starting to get fuzzy wheni try to rember what happedn all i know is that the truck lost rpm and speedand as far as i know did not loose speed but there is a time laps of about 30min i cant account for but now when i got to sleep there is this feeling that iam to find somthing and return it but i cant remember whatand the smae message keeps comming back to me in my sleep i am eather to findsomthing or someone i cant tell wich the message is find the barron or barrons idont know i have even went to a shrink that is a good freind of mine and hetried to hypnotise me and it would not work so he says i need some relif
trends: There have been no other sightings in navajo
This sighting has never been favorited.
